alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:14PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong Thunderstorm Outflow Wind Gusts May Impact Park County through 645 PM MDT... Thunderstorms developing to the west of Park County are expected to move into the Paradise Valley by 6 PM MDT. Little precipitation is expected from this activity, but strong wind gusts are likely. These wind gusts may travel well away from the main storm, producing sudden strong wind gusts, particularly in the Livingston area. Be prepared for these strong wind gusts through early this evening. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Gardiner, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico, Corwin Springs, Emigrant, and Jardine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley
